author: Not available

text.11: Nalles ic ðe, wine min,           wordum cide,
text.12: ðy ic ðe gesawe         æt ðam sweordplegan
text.14: wig forbugan           oððe on weal fleon,
text.15: lice beorgan,           ðeah þe laðra fela
text.17: ac ðu symle furðor           feohtan sohtest,
text.18: mæl ofer mearce;           ðy ic ðe metod ondred,
text.19: þæt ðu to fyrenlice           feohtan sohtest
text.2: monna ænigum           ðara ðe Mimming can
text.22: godum dædum,           ðenden ðin god recce.
text.23: Ne murn ðu for ði mece;           ðe wearð maðma cyst
text.24: gifeðe to geoce,         mid ðy ðu Guðhere scealt
text.25: beot forbigan,           ðæs ðe he ðas beaduwe ongan
text.27: Forsoc he ðam swurde           and ðam syncfatum,
text.3: heardne gehealdan.           Oft æt hilde gedreas
text.30: ealdne ᛟ           oððe her ær swefan,
text.5: ætlan ordwyga,           ne læt ðin ellen nu gy...
text.8: þæt ðu scealt aninga           oðer twega,

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
